title: ICE: assertion failed: self.hashes.insert(k, v).is_none()

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
This ICE happens sometimes when compiling the tests of https://github.com/Marwes/serde/tree/ice. Still investigating as to what is the cause of it though it is likely something to do with custom derive,

```
RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo test --all
   Compiling serde_test_suite v0.0.0 (file:///C:/Users/Markus/Dropbox/Programming/serde/test_suite)
error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports

note: rustc 1.20.0-nightly (d84693b93 2017-07-09) running on x86_64-pc-windows-msvc

note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace

thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: self.hashes.insert(k, v).is_none()', src\librustc_incremental\calculate_svh\mod.rs:70:8
stack backtrace:
   0: _rdl_shrink_in_place
   1: std::panicking::Location::column
   2: std::panicking::Location::column
   3: std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook
   4: <unknown>
   5: rustc_incremental::calculate_svh::IncrementalHashesMap::insert
   6: <rustc_incremental::calculate_svh::IncrementalHashesMap as core::ops::index::Index<&'a rustc::dep_graph::dep_node::DepNode>>::index
   7: <rustc_incremental::calculate_svh::ComputeItemHashesVisitor<'a, 'tcx> as rustc::hir::itemlikevisit::ItemLikeVisitor<'tcx>>::visit_item
   8: rustc_incremental::calculate_svh::compute_incremental_hashes_map
   9: rustc_driver::driver::count_nodes
  10: rustc_driver::driver::count_nodes
  11: rustc_driver::driver::compile_input
  12: rustc_driver::run_compiler
  13: <unknown>
  14: _rust_maybe_catch_panic
  15: <rustc_driver::derive_registrar::Finder as rustc::hir::itemlikevisit::ItemLikeVisitor<'v>>::visit_trait_item
  16: std::sys::imp::thread::Thread::new
  17: BaseThreadInitThunk

error: Could not compile `serde_test_suite`.
warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
```

```
$ rustc --version --verbose
rustc 1.20.0-nightly (d84693b93 2017-07-09)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: d84693b93dae3958e3504f817face0184c5c3fdd
commit-date: 2017-07-09
host: x86_64-pc-windows-msvc
release: 1.20.0-nightly
LLVM version: 4.0

$ cargo --version --verbose
cargo 0.21.0-nightly (70b89fdd7 2017-07-10)
release: 0.21.0
commit-hash: 70b89fdd7e5e77a3b88fc68982861d39d155be29
commit-date: 2017-07-10
```
